vote.text: Amendment SA 977 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 977 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Schatz. (consideration: CR S6232-6233; text as modified: CR S6233) To improve the bill.
